title: Is riot aware of this? Possible copyright
body:
Riot Have you guys given permission for a hardstyle artist Sub Zero project for their song "lets fight"  to use some of rengars voice? Noticed theres a few audio clips of rengars quotes in there. Just checking rly.

Pre cool song anyway.


Have a good day guys and i hope to get a response from rito!

replies.body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A4uGa88rCDw

Not just one, they pretty much used all of his quotes, or at least half of it.

Also found another with K6 VO, pretty sure this comes under sampling.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DUVpy4oV5F0
So sampling isnt copyright? Soz not familiar with the term tbh
